document.full_text: the mets had hoped to have the injured outfielder jason bay in the lineup tuesday, but will have him play two more games with class st. lucie this week.
document.title: mets push back bay's return to thursday
lines_and_colors: the mets had hoped to have the injured outfielder jason bay in the lineup tuesday, but will have him play two more games with class st. lucie this week.
